title: The Day Independence Came
itunes:author: Guest: AIO drama
itunes:summary:
In this Adventures in Odyssey drama, Irwin Springer, a middle schooler interested in history, takes a wild journey back to the American Revolution, where he meets the men who shaped the United States.

Receive "Adventures in Odyssey For God and Country" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-07-04?refcd=1439802

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/the-day-independence-came/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
